sentences.sentence: Select your favourite fruit or veg and pickle them while they are still fresh.
sentences.translation: 挑选你最喜欢的水果或蔬菜，趁新鲜腌制起来。

sentences.sentence: At Fortnum's, you'll find the finest caviar, cheeses, fresh fruit, veg, fish, poultry and meats, as well as a huge range of teas and, of course, marmalade!
sentences.translation: 在福特纳姆梅森百货，你可以找到上好的鱼子酱、奶酪、新鲜水果、蔬菜、鱼、家禽、肉类以及种类繁多的茶叶，当然还有，果酱！
